segments.text: Daniel , what are you doing here ? Aren't you supposed to be at school now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we shall make it a secret between us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is the cheer-leader . They are required to put on a performance . Look ! Here they come .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , look at her . She looks like one is the basketball babies in NBA .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to be like her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Get real . Don't be so pathetic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hey , young man ! I'm your sis . Don't talk to me like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , man , look at her , go ! She is amazing ! She should be my sis .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Boy , you've got such a crush on her , haven't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I want to be her boyfriend . Just like in the movie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you out of your mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She told me she liked my new haircut . She thought it was cool .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Go ahead , have a try and be a joke .
segments.speaker: S1
